thread.title: Single mother-of-three blows through £6,000 in four weeks
thread.title_full: Single mother-of-three blows through £6,000 in four weeks

title: Single mother-of-three blows through £6,000 in four weeks
text: Single mother-of-three blows £6,000 on perfume, gifts and clothes in FOUR WEEKS after she's handed £26,000 to come off benefits (and has to give up her plan to open a hair salon) Donna, 38, from Southend-on-Sea has three sons Reggie, George and Jacob She has been on benefits since she was 16 and never had a full-time job Has an NVQ qualification in hairdressing and dreams of opening her own salon Handed the lump sum in Channel 5 programme Great British Benefits Handout Reality bites when she's told to stop spending because the money won't last
